prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and distinctive yellow accents.
Generate a penguin-like Pokemon that showcases icy features and a proud demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of exploration and has a unique aquatic design.
Make a charming water Pokemon that is both playful and fiercely protective of its territory.
Show me a Pokemon that blends elements of sea life with a regal, avian appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in icy habitats and has a striking blue and white color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that represents the beauty of the ocean and has a confident, determined personality.
